name: AddConstantFields
description: Add fixed fields to every record.

fields.description: Dictionary of field names to constant values.

name: DropSpecifiedFields
description: Remove specified fields from every record.

fields_to_drop.description: List of field names to remove.

name: KeepOnlySpecifiedFields
description: Keep only specified fields in every record.

fields_to_keep.description: List of field names to retain.

rename_fields.description: Dictionary mapping old names to new names.

name: DuplicateFields
description: Copy values from one field to another (duplicate fields).

duplicate_fields.description: Dictionary mapping source fields to target fields.

name: SortManifest
description: Sort manifest by a specified attribute. Note: This processor loads all records into memory for sorting.

descending.description: If True, sort in descending order.

name: FilterByField
description: Filter records based on a field value.

values.description: List of allowed values. Records with field value in this list are kept.

exclude.description: If True, exclude records with matching values instead.

name: PassThrough
description: Pass records through unchanged. Useful for testing or as a no-op placeholder.
